nodes.text: Yenko Farr was a male Mandalorian of Clan Farr living during the Galactic War. In 3630 BBY, he and his three sisters answered the call by Mandalore the Avenger to join the Mandalorian clans in the raid on Darvannis. Yenko Farr and his sisters were in the team led by Valk Beroya on a mission to disable the factory's northern power generator. Though the mission was a success, Yenko Farr and his three sisters all perished during the fight.
Yenko Farr is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire Chapter 14: Mandalore the Avenger.
